about_the_game: Thank you for playing Obama Maze. If you'd like to help get me away from my minimum wage job you can buy this DLC which doesn't include anything. This is just a donation for now and will go away once more DLCs come out. Once more DLCs arrive this will act like a season pass, allowing you to play all the DLCs.
detailed_description: Thank you for playing Obama Maze. If you'd like to help get me away from my minimum wage job you can buy this DLC which doesn't include anything. This is just a donation for now and will go away once more DLCs come out. Once more DLCs arrive this will act like a season pass, allowing you to play all the DLCs.
legal_notice: This game is not an opinion or meant to defame the former United States President. This is a merely a comedy-horror game.
name: Obama Maze - Feed the Developer
